title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.15 - Membership in or association with unapproved pilotage organization prohibited; forfeiture of pilot's license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.15 - Membership in or association with unapproved pilotage organization prohibited; forfeiture of pilot's license

State Regulations

No pilot licensed by the board shall belong to, or be
associated with, any association relating to pilotage which shall adopt any
rule or regulation for the government of pilots unless such association submits
to the board all rules and regulations for the government of pilots adopted by
it and receives the approval of the board of such rules and regulations before
attempting to put such rules or regulations into effect. A failure to observe
this section may result in the forfeiture of a pilot's
license. Notes

56.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
